title: Popularity of Fidel Castro in Cuba 2015
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Very/somewhat_negative where Share of respondents is 50.0.
The lowest category is found at Don't_know_/_no_answer where Share of respondents is 6.0.
gold: This statistic shows the results of a 2015 survey among adult Cubans living in Cuba on their opinion of Fidel Castro , their former President . 50 percent of respondents stated they have a very or somewhat negative opinion of Fidel Castro .
